pages.text: You may have noticed that allowing $(thing)elements/$ to mix is a pretty bad idea. However, if they make contact in a $(item)Catalyst/$, the reactions can have much more controlled effects. Just make sure they're meeting only at a $(item)Catalyst/$, and not any adjacent $(item)Conduits/$. Or make your entire pipe out of $(item)Catalysts/$. I can't stop you.
The $(item)Catalyst/$ enables $(l:basic/reaction_crafting)reaction crafting/$ either via $(thing)air/$+$(thing)earth/$ or $(thing)fire/$+$(thing)water/$ reactions.
